title: (x) Freesat website logo and titling face - Klavika {Rainer}
content:
What is the name of the font used on Freesat and some of the colored headings on this page?

[http://www.freesat.co.uk/home.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110708/http:/www.freesat.co.uk/home.php "http://www.freesat.co.uk/home.php")

 [‹ Ampersand Flair](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45088 "Go to previous forum topic") [Roman type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45064 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: Here is the [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110708/http:/www.identifont.com/show?GAE) to Klavika, by Eric Olson.
